returns.hasKey: True if the user has a valid key

grantKeys(address[],uint256[],address[]).details: Only lock managers can call this function

params._expirationTimestamps: Array of expiration timestamps for each key
params._keyManagers: Array of addresses to manage each key
params._recipients: Array of addresses to receive keys

returns.tokenIds: Array of token IDs for the granted keys

returns._0: True if the account is a lock manager

returns.timestamp: The expiration timestamp (0 if no key)

expirationDuration().notice: Returns the duration of each key

getHasValidKey(address).notice: Checks if an address has a valid (non-expired) key

grantKeys(address[],uint256[],address[]).notice: Grants keys (badges/memberships) to recipients without payment

isLockManager(address).notice: Checks if an address is a lock manager

keyExpirationTimestampFor(address).notice: Gets the expiration timestamp for a user's key

maxNumberOfKeys().notice: Returns the maximum number of keys that can be sold

name().notice: Returns the name of the lock

renounceLockManager().notice: Renounces the lock manager role for the caller

totalSupply().notice: Returns the total number of keys issued
